>
[Spyglass Eye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2159)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 108 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Polished to a perfect surface and incredibly clear, this special [_magical prosthetic eye_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2156) allows you to clearly see small details as well as things a great distance away.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spyglass Eye
